@description.name: @description
@description.body: Exposes Sinon.JS to qooxdoo. This class exposes Sinon.JS (http://sinonjs.org/) and is not to be used directly. Instead, you should include qx.dev.unit.MMock in your TestCase and use the wrappers provided.

@ignore.name: @ignore
@ignore.body: module, require, global, ProgressEvent, CustomEvent, clearImmediate
